metaTags.metaDescription: Improve conversions, reduce churn & improve your visitor experience with mobile application optimization. Learn more about Cloudflare Performance Services.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Accelerate Mobile Experiences
relatedBlades.subtitle: Increase engagement and conversions, regardless of distance to origin servers, device type, or network health
relatedBlades.copy:
Mobile visitors expect fast, rich online experiences. Mobile device and cellular network limitations can degrade a users mobile experience, resulting in lower conversions, loss of revenue, and degraded brand perception.

Mobile applications and web pages require the speed and scale of a global network to combat mobile-induced latencies and globally dispersed users with poor connectivity. Cloudflare optimizes image files for mobile consumption, and provides developers with tools to improve native mobile app performance on challenging networks.

image.description: Illustration of a rocket ship and a mobile device

imageAssetFile.altText: Ensure application accelerate mobile experiences spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Ensure application accelerate mobile experiences spot illustration

features.title: Global scale
features.description: Cloudflare's global Anycast network spans %{DataCenterCount} cities across %{CountryCount} countries, delivering content closest to mobile visitors anywhere in the world.

features.title: Ease of use
features.description: Setting up Cloudflare takes as little as 5 minutes. The easy-to-use dashboard enables quick configuration of fine-grained functionalities to improve the performance of mobile Internet applications.

features.title: Integrated security and performance
features.description: Cloudflare includes integrated security services to defend against DDoS attacks, customer data breaches, and abusive bots, while preventing performance trade-offs.

relatedBlades.title: Mobile device limitations
relatedBlades.copy: As more visitors utilize mobile devices to engage with Internet applications, the challenges of heavier pages and longer distances to origin infrastructure worsen. The limited CPU, memory, and power of mobile devices slows down the processing of content delivered through mobile browsers.

relatedBlades.title: Cellular network limitations
relatedBlades.copy: Cellular networks are often spottier than wired connections and operators have been known to throttle connection speeds. In addition, network infrastructure across many countries is so slowly upgraded that they cannot accommodate modern throughput rates.

relatedBlades.title: Mobile application API usage
relatedBlades.copy: Mobile applications utilize APIs and increase the number of calls to origin servers. This reduces the effectiveness of static content caching and requires visitor requests to travel longer distances to the origin, resulting in slower performance and higher likelihood of overloaded infrastructure.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's Mobile Performance Services
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's Mobile Performance Services adds additional features to our [Web Performance Services](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/). These services address the challenges of fast application delivery to mobile clients which typically have more limited CPU, memory, power, and network speeds than desktops.

relatedBlades.quote: "With Cloudflare's CDN the load time of our images improved by 2-3x and on top of that we're saving over 50% on our monthly bandwidth usage."

contentfulAsset.description: Diagram of Cloudflare's infrastructure accelerating internet applications

content.value: Heavy pages and long distances from the origin slow down Internet applications. Accelerate the delivery of static and dynamic content for higher conversions, better engagement, and lower infrastructure, operational, and development costs

entry_button.elementName: Ensure Application Availability - Accelerate Internet Applications - CTA

content.value: Overloaded or unavailable infrastructure prevents users from accessing applications. Keep Internet applications fast,
, and scalable, even during unexpected traffic spikes or infrastructure outages.
